trait.name: Aura Of Life
text: When an undead creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the bloom, it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be turned until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Blessed Regrowth
text: At the start of each of the ecstatic bloom's turns, the bloom and each good-aligned creature, including the bloom, within 10 feet of it regains 4 (1d8) hp. If the bloom takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the bloom's next turn. The ecstatic bloom dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn't regain hp from this trait.

trait.name: Foster The Trees
text: Alabaster trees within 60 feet of the ecstatic bloom have advantage on all saving throws.

trait.name: Like Calls To Like
text: The ecstatic bloom knows if a creature within 120 feet of it is good-aligned or not.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ecstatic bloom makes three gilded beam attacks.

action.name: Gilded Beam
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Castigate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: The bloom summons a chorus of booming celestial voices that descend into the minds of nearby creatures. Each creature within 30 feet of the bloom must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. Castigate only affects non-good-aligned creatures with an Intelligence of 5 or higher.
